entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 6.
